column7: Q1L0|Does the company acknowledge climate change as a significant issue for the business?
column8: Q2L1|Does the company explicitly recognise climate change as a relevant risk and/or opportunity to the business?
column9: Q3L1|Does the company have a policy (or equivalent) commitment to action on climate change?
column10: Q4L2|Has the company set greenhouse gas emission reduction targets?
column11: Q5L2|Has the company published information on its Scope 1 and 2 greenhouse gas emissions?
column12: Q6L3|Has the company nominated a board member or board committee with explicit responsibility for oversight of the climate change policy?
column13: Q7L3|Has the company set quantitative targets for reducing its greenhouse gas emissions?
column14: Q8L3|Does the company report on Scope 3 emissions?
column15: Q9L3|Has the company had its operational (Scope 1 and/or 2) greenhouse gas emissions data verified?
column16: Q10L3|Does the company support domestic and international efforts to mitigate climate change?
column17: Q11L4|Has the company set long-term quantitative targets for reducing its greenhouse gas emissions?
column18: Q12L4|Has the company incorporated environmental, social and governance issues into executive remuneration?
column19: Q13L4|Has the company reduced its operational (Scope 1 and 2) greenhouse gas emissions over the past 3 years?
column20: Q14L4|Does the company provide information on the business costs associated with climate change?
